attributes.action: Ensure UK citizens have the right to recapture illegal bank charges up until the day a UK court find them legal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, thousands of people are going through the process of reclaiming illegal bank charges. The OFT, a body set up to protect the consumer, has now agreed with seven major banks, to allow a freeze of ongoing claims until the issue is decided by a test case in the high court.

As the charges are illegal, anyone who has been charged should be able claim them back now, rather than wait months or years for a ruling by the High Court.
